system.description:
This small leather satchel is the perfect shape and size to be worn on the hip or slung across the body without impeding movement.

Whenever you take either the gather components, harvest, or hunt and gather journey activity, you gain an expertise die on the relevant ability check. The haversack may carry up to 10 pounds of materials foraged in this fashion, and any fresh ingredients that you gather and place into the forager’s haversack are immediately processed into their usable state—herbs are dried, bark is stripped, and extracts (including poison) are collected.
system.craftingComponents: Diplodocus hide and bark harvested from a dryad’s tree with their blessing
